Combat
Hit Points: 164 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 18 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Plate Shield: None Weapons: Glaive (+6 1d10); Longbow (+8 1d8+2 R150/600); Morningstar (+6 1d8); Unarmed (+6 1)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Tough: +40 Hit Points
Champion Challenge: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to force targets to stay within 30' (save DC 16 Wisdom negates)
Divine Allegiance: R5' Can use a reaction to shift damage inflicted on another creature onto self
Divine Smite: Can spend a spell slot after a successful melee attack to inflict +(slot level + 1)d8 HP radiant (maximum 5d8 HP; +1d8 HP vs. undead and fiends)
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Exalted Champion: Can use an action to gain resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for 1 hr once per long rest
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with a single, one-handed melee weapon
Improved Divine Smite: Melee attacks inflict +1d8 HP radiant
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 8; Constitution: 3; Dexterity: 2; Intelligence: 1; Strength: 0; Wisdom: 6
Save Notes:
Aura Of Courage: R30' Self and allies have immunity to fright
Aura Of Protection: R30' Self and allies +2 all saves
Divine Health: Has immunity to disease
Exalted Champion: R30' Can use an action to give self and allies advantage on Wisdom and vs. Death for 1 hr once per long rest
Unyielding Spirit: Has advantage vs. paralysis and stunning
Magic
Spell Slots: P1: 4; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 2; S0: 2; S1: 1 Attack: P: 8; S: 8 Spell DC: P: 16; S: 16
Spells:
Aura Of Purity (P4 Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to poison damage, immunity to disease, and advantage on saves vs. conditions for concentration up to 10 min
Aura Of Vitality (P3 Evoc): R30' Self can use a bonus action to restore 2d6 hit points to a target once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Aura Of Vitality (P3 [Oath Of The Crown] Evoc): R30' Self can use a bonus action to restore 2d6 hit points to a target once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Banishing Smite (P5 Abju): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +5d10 HP force, plus banishment to home plane or a demiplane for concentration up to 1 min if the attack reduces the target below 51 hit points
Banishment (P4 [Oath Of The Crown] Abju): R60' Banishes the target to its home plane or a demiplane (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Branding Smite (P2 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP radiant and lights the target for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Charm Person (S1 Ench): R30' Target regards self as a friend (save Wisdom negates) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Circle Of Power (P5 [Oath Of The Crown] Abju): Allies in a 30' radius have advantage on saves vs. magic, and saves yields no damage instead of half, for concentration up to 10 min
Command (P1 [Oath Of The Crown] Ench): R60' Target obeys a one-word command from self (save Wisdom negates) for 1 rd [+Level affects +1 target]
Compelled Duel (P1 [Oath Of The Crown] Ench): R30' Target stays within 30' of self (save Wisdom negates) and suffers disadvantage on attacks on others for concentration up to 1 min; self attacking another or a successful attack on the target by an ally ends
Cure Wounds (P1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+2 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Elemental Weapon (P3 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 attack and +1d4 HP damage of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level gives +2 or +3 attack and +2d4 or +3d4 damage at level 5 or 7]
Find Steed (P2 Conj): R10' Self gains the service of a summoned spirit in steed form
Fire Bolt (S0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d10 HP fire or ignites an unattended flammable target
Geas (P5 Ench): R60' Target obeys self instructions (save Wisdom negates) for 30 days [+Level extends the duration to 1 yr or permanently at level 7 or 9]
Geas (P5 [Oath Of The Crown] Ench): R60' Target obeys self instructions (save Wisdom negates) for 30 days [+Level extends the duration to 1 yr or permanently at level 7 or 9]
Guardian Of Faith (P4 [Oath Of The Crown] Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (save Dexterity half) for 8 hr or until 60 HP inflicted
Heroism (P1 Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +2 temporary hit points each rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Locate Creature (P4 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified creature or species within 1000' for concentration up to 1 hr; running water blocks
Locate Object (P2 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified object or type within 1000' for concentration up to 10 min; lead blocks
Prestidigitation (S0 Tran): R10' Creates minor magic effects for 1 hr
Purify Food And Drink (P1 Tran): R10' Removes poison and disease from nonmagical food and drink in a 5' radius [R]
Remove Curse (P3 Abju): Frees a touched creature from all curses or breaks the attunement to a touched cursed object
Spirit Guardians (P3 [Oath Of The Crown] Conj): 15' radius inflicts on foes 3d8 HP necrotic or radiant (save Wisdom half) and half Speed for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Staggering Smite (P4 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack within concentration up to 1 min inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, disadvantage on attacks and ability checks for 1 rd, and loss of reactions for 1 rd (save Wisdom HP only)
Thunderous Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP thunder and a 10' push (save Strength HP only) for concentration up to 1 min
Warding Bond (P2 [Oath Of The Crown] Abju): Touched gains +1 AC, +1 saves, and resistance to all damage while within 60' of self, and any damage to the target also affects self, for 1 hr
Zone Of Truth (P2 [Oath Of The Crown] Ench): R60' Creatures in a 15' radius cannot lie (save Charisma negates) for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 sorcerer cantrips and can cast a chosen S1 spell once per long rest
Cleansing Touch: Can dispel a spell effect on a touched willing creature 2 times per long rest
Elemental Adept (Acid): Spells that inflict acid damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Lay On Hands: Can heal 100 hit points per long rest and can use 5 hit points' worth to cure disease or poison
Spell Sniper: Can cast attack spells at double normal range/Spells ignore 3/4 cover/Knows an additional attack cantrip
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the paladin spell list
Turn The Tide: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to restore 1d6+2 hit points to targets with fewer than half their maximum hit points
